core.name: Discipline, Undefiable
core.description:
Leader Bonus
Leader Skill: Increases the team's ranged Lightning DMG by 40.0% and the team's Total DMG by 20.0%.

subskills.name: This Discipline, Indispensable
subskills.description: Increases the team's ranged Lightning DMG by 40.0% and the team's Total DMG by 20.0%.

core.name: Combo ATK: Good and Evil, Absolute
core.description:
In Conviction, teammates on the field deal Disciplinary Perdition's DMG.
In Conviction, she prays for the Valkyries on the field, allowing Lightning DMG dealers to deal 135% Disciplinary Perdition's ATK of bonus Lightning DMG to all enemies (CD: 0.4s).
At full Redemption, hold [ATK] to enter Predictor's Sentence, which reduces incoming Total DMG by 80% and summons Thunderstorms dealing 16 x 125% ATK of Lightning DMG in total to surrounding enemies. When Redemption falls to 0, she unleashes Inhibitor's Adjudication that deals 1850% ATK of Lightning DMG to all enemies and cancels Predictor's Sentence.

subskills.name: Insolence is Forbidden
subskills.description: Increases Combo ATK's Total DMG by 15.0%. In Conviction, every triggerd Combo ATK restores 10.0 Redemption.

subskills.name: Imprudence is Forbidden
subskills.description: Increases Combo ATK's Lightning DMG by 15.0%. In Conviction, every landed Combo ATK restores 0.20 SP.

subskills.name: Avarice is Forbidden
subskills.description: Inhibitor's Adjudication deals 300.0% ATK of bonus Lightning DMG and restores 5.0 SP.

core.name: This Life, Ascetic
core.description:
Passive bonuses apply automatically.
Redemption, which caps at 200, can be recovered in many ways.
Basic ATK SEQ 3/4 restores 10/25 Redemption on hit.
By wielding the chakram as a ring, she has acquired the weapon active This Mind, Untainted.
Without full Redemption, using weapon active sends her into Conviction.
In Conviction, she recovers 5 Redemption(max: 200) per second, becomes invincible but unable to move or evade, and will stay on the field until charging is complete if switched out.
Once Redemption reaches 200, she exits Conviction, and leaves and resets her switch CD if she is still on the field.

subskills.name: I Shall Correct Paths
subskills.description: Entering perdictor's Sentence increases Total DMG by 30.0% for 9.0s.

subskills.name: I Shall Achieve Illumination
subskills.description: Increases Inhibitor's Adjudication's Lightning DMG by 45.0%. Exiting Predictor's Sentence restores 15.0 SP.

subskills.name: I Shall Avert Ruination
subskills.description: Triggering Ultimate Evasion Skill makes enemies take 20.0% bonus Lightning DMG from her (cannot stack) for 12.0s.

core.name: This Sin, Inexorable
core.description:
Aponia rises into the sky and delivers punishment to all enemies.
Rain down destruction from above, dealing 14 x 180% + 1280% ATK of Lightning DMG to all enemies, during which all skill timers and the stage timer are paused.
SP cost: 100. CD: 20s.

subskills.name: Its Sin, Irredeemable
subskills.description: Exiting Predictor's Sentence increases Ultimate's Total DMG by 35.0% for 4.0s.

subskills.name: Its Sin, Unforgivable
subskills.description: In Conviction, Good and Evil, Absolute triggered by teammates on the field deals 15.0% ATK of bonus Lightning DMG.

subskills.name: Its Sin Deserves Excommunication
subskills.description: Using Ultimate increases Basic ATK's and Combo ATK's Total DMG by 20.0% and reduces incoming Total DMG by 30.0% for 12.0s.

core.name: This Soma, Reincarnated
core.description:
Quickly dodge enemy attacks. Can be performed twice in a row.
Ultimate Evasion Skill: Causes a 2.5s Global Time Fracture, unleashes Summoner's Promise that deals 3 x 300% ATK of Lightning DMG to all enemies, and restores 100 HP to the team. CD: 15s.

subskills.name: To See Strings Detach
subskills.description: If an enemy is paralyzed, restores 40.0 Redemption and triggers Ultimate Evasion Skill (effective if controlling another Valkyrie). The ensuing Summoner's Promise deals 50.0% more Lightning DMG.

subskills.name: To See Suffering Cycle
subskills.description: Increases Summoner's Promise's Total DMG by 30.0% and reduces its CD by 4.0s.

subskills.name: To See Ending Decay
subskills.description: Entering Conviction or Predictor's Sentence triggers Ultimate Evasion Skill.

core.name: Love and Hate, Discerned
core.description:
Using the chakram as a ring to purge enemies.
Basic ATK:
SEQ 1: Deals 3 x 65% ATK of Lightning DMG.
SEQ 2: Deals 6 x 25% ATK of Lightning DMG.
SEQ 3: Deals 65% + 80% ATK of Lightning DMG.
SEQ4: Deals 250% ATK of Lightning DMG.
In Conviction, hold [ATK] to call down lightning dealing 100% ATK of Lightning DMG. It is registered as Combo ATK and has a 0.35s CD.

subskills.name: Cleansed Henceforth
subskills.description: Restoring Redemption increases Total DMG by 20.0% for 10.0s (triggering it again refreshes the duration).

subskills.name: QTE: Sinful Henceforth
subskills.description: QTE: Triggered when an enemy is Time-Slowed or paralyzed. Causes a 3s Global Time Fracture, deals 3 x 100% + 4 x 150% + 900.0% ATK of Lightning DMG to all enemies, and restores 6.0 SP.
